name: Pair-a-Social
description:
Play as one of four content creators who work in various mediums and collab with your friends to try to make rent by the end of the month.

A short game made for me to learn RenPy with.

CONTENT WARNING/FEATURE LIST

  • Explicit Language and Themes
  • Sexual Language and Themes
  • Blue Hair and Pronouns

Soundtrack available here:
https://jenndragon.bandcamp.com/album/pair-a-social-ost
